tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PestInfestationData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  environment_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  pest_type TEXT,
  pest_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE pests_table (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_name VARCHAR(255),
    infestation_level INT,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_conditions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    pressure FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE PestIdentification (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, pest_type TEXT, infestation_level INT);
CREATE TABLE SensorData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, temperature FLOAT, humidity FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalConditions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP, location TEXT, weather_condition TEXT, wind_speed FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE pest_infestation_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    pest_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_conditions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    air_pressure FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_locations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    pest_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_conditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);
